author: Daniel Henninger
title: Is Facebook a Frankenstein?
text:
Like Mark Zuckerberg, Doctor Frankenstein was a good guy whose experiment just got out of hand. Now the mobs are howling after Facebook, Mr. Zuckerberg’s creature.
It is true that Facebook’s release of personal “friend data” into the ozone through Cambridge Analytica remains in the news only because of the prevailing superstition that the Facebook monster allowed Donald Trump to be elected president. The idea that omnipotent technology manipulated the 2016 election has greater appeal to advanced progressive thinking than...
